title: Offshore Compliance Programs Generate $8 Billion; IRS Urges People to Take Advantage of Voluntary Disclosure ...
text: ( Source : IRS - Internal Revenue Service ) IR-2015-116, Oct. 16, 2015 WASHINGTON-With more than 54, 000 taxpayers coming in to participate in offshore disclosure programs since 2009, the Internal Revenue Service today reminded U.S. taxpayers
